attributes.action: If MP leaves party they should resign
attributes.additional_details: Constituents vote for a party as well as person and if the MP is convinced they represent their constituents they should have courage of their convictions to allow the constituents the choice
attributes.background: If an MP chooses to leave their party they should resign and allow their constituents the choice in who their MP should be.

rejection.details:
